channel.title: -SlashScape- -Webclient-24/7-Economy-PKing-Community-Bosses-Minigames
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://slash-scape.com/forum/images/styles/vbgamev4/vbgame_logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
>Visit our website at [url=http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php]http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php[/url] >Register for SlashScape: [url=http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php]http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php[/url] >Play SlashScape here:[url=http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php]http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php[/url]
[IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/7753/67913671.png[/img] [CENTER]Slashscape is a fast growing RS private server. We have been up for nearly five years, and still going strong. We strive to do all we can to make sure you have the best gameplay experience possible. We have a nice and friendly community with very responsive staff who will not ignore you and will make sure to attend to your needs and problems. Our server is expansive and new features are being implemented in every day. So join today, start your adventure, complete quests and win enormous treasures in a 3D world of magic and monsters.[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/9206/31678570.png[/img] -We are mainly a PK server with plenty of minigames, skills, and features. -We are up dedicated, up 24/7 with no lag. -New updates coming up every day. -Stable economy. -You can toggel fixed, resizable, and fullscreen mode on our client. -We offer standard and HD graphics. -667 server with 474 graphics and interface. All NPC's, emotes, and gfx have been integrated for our client.
[IMG]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/7979/10872003.png[/img] -We have an advanced vBulletin forum. -Are forums are connected to the server so you can: register on the forums and instantly play in-game. check your ingame high-scores online. check your offence history. create support tickets. -You can also check the Game Update Log to see what recent updates have been made. -The forums are an overall fun place to hang out and have in-game discussions or simply share some entertaining stuff.
[IMG]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/5692/74462589.png[/img] [CENTER]Slashscape has a nice friendly community with over 2500 active users. We pride ourselves in our fun community where anyone's voice can be heard. We make sure everyone has a chance to be involved. We also offer community events such as PK events, SOTW, POTW, and more.[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/7231/87181572.png[/img] [CENTER]We make sure our players have the best experience possible when playing Slashscape. That is why we hand select a mature staff to help maintain the community. The staff is kind and will not ignore your individual needs. We ask you to be respectful to our staff members and they will respect you back. Our new User Management Page will allow the staff to assist the players by allowing the to manage and create support tickets to communicate directly with our staff.[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/931/78722069.png[/img] We feature plenty of minigames to keep your entertained. Some of those minigames include: -Fight Caves -Pest Control -Fight Pits -Duel Arena -Kill Zone -Godwars Dungeon -Castle Wars -Barrows We also feature many bosses including King Black Dragon and the Kalphite Queen.
[IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/5518/84705022.png[/img] We have almost every skill working in Slashscape. That includes: -All combat skills; Hitpoints, Attack, Strength, Defense, Range, and Magic -Prayer -Cooking -Woodcutting -Fletching -Fishing -Firemaking -Crafting -Smithing -Mining -Thieving -Slayer
[IMG]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/7283/81984750.png[/img] PKing is an important part of the game and there are plenty of areas to kill. Some include: -Annakarl -Varrock -Edgeville -Green Dragons -Kill Zone We also offer a PK point system with great rewards!
[center][b]Join today![/b][/center]
>Visit our website at [url=http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php]http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php[/url] >Register for SlashScape: [url=http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php]http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php[/url] >Play SlashScape here:[url=http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php]http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php[/url]
Pictures (More coming soon): [SPOILER="Pictures"][img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/1580/53379507.png[/img] [img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/5530/mustafa1.png[/img] [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/6237/mustafa2d.png[/img] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/3079/mustafa3.png[/img] [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/2439/mustafa4.png[/img] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/8770/mustafa5.png[/img] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4748/mustafa6.png[/img] [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/6141/71440440.png[/img] [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/7051/76748314.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/2400/mustafa0.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/5530/mustafa1.png[/img] [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/853/mustafa2.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/4748/mustafa6.png[/img] [img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/6614/mustafa7.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Recent upates:
[QUOTE]Hello SlashScape!
Today we have a long list of in-game updates:
PVP Equipment:
Pvp equipment now degrades during combat. This is necessary as combat is way too unbalanced so long as Pvp equipment does not degrade, and some players become impossible to kill.
However, unlike other half-assed runescape private servers, each piece of equipment degrades separately - just as it does in RuneScape. So, immediately after being used in combat, pieces of PVP equipment will slightly degrade and will not be tradeable. Each degraded piece will be separated in your bank. After a certain amount of hits on each piece of equipment, they will fully degrade and crumble to dust.
The price of PvP equipment in the credits shop has been updated accordingly.
Barrows Equipment
We have updated the barrows equipment to use the same degrade system as Pvp equipment, however barrows equipment (obviously) degrades much more slowly. Each partially degraded piece of barrows equipment will not be tradeable, and separated in your bank (each piece will degrade separately).
Also, the bonuses from partially-degraded barrows equipment have been fixed.
PK Points & PVP Drops:
The PK points system has been totally updated, and is now totally based upon the amount of risked wealth you're carrying at the time of your kill. This is not the only factor, however, as there are many other factors to prevent item farming.
PvP equipment has also been removed from the PK shop and will now randomly be dropped after killing another player (other rare items are randomly dropped, as well). The drop rates are based upon how much risked wealth you're carrying, along with other factors (such as combat difference, the area, etc).
For example... A player with 50m risked items (yes, gold counts too) will get more PK points per kill, and a much higher chance of getting a rare PvP drop. However, items which are safe (for example, from the protect item prayer) do not count in your risked items. Also, players who are not skulled will receive little to no PK points per kill.
Have fun! - Mod Ryan.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE]Hello SlashScape!
Colored Whips & Dark Bows:
You can now get colored whips and dark bows from Pest Control! Though they are a bit expensive, their street price will outweigh the effort
If you want to get your hands on these new colored items right away, you can get them immediately using SlashScape Credits!
Vine Whips:
Vine whips have now been added to the game, with a 80 attack requirement and a neat special attack. The non-colored version (red) is rarely dropped by abyssal demons in the Slayer Tower.
The special attack, when activated in combat, will hit your opponent 10 times (1 hit/7 seconds) as long as you stay in combat with that player and have the whip equipped. Each hit will have will have a 25% accuracy boost, but will only hit with 33% of your strength.
Also, the special attack does not stack.
If you want one of these new whips right away, head over to the SlashScape Credits Center! You can get the abyssal vine whips in 5 different colors, and the other 4 colors are ONLY available with SlashScape credits (special colored vine whips are not dropped by abyssal demons).
All of the new items are tradeable.
Glitch Fixes: The glitch that prevented you from picking up dropped flags in cwars has been fixed. You can no longer enter your team base in cwars while you have the flag equipped. Clicking the team base portal in cwars has been fixed. The glitch that deleted your item when removing your equippment with a full inventory has been fixed.
Have fun! - Ryan.[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE]Hello.
Here are some updates from today. Special thanks to @James for his help! The glitch preventing trading of random items has been fixed. Degradeable items are no longer tradeable. The degrade rate of PVP and barrows equipment has been lowered so they last longer. Charges for dragonfire shields are now seperate for each individual shield, are are not tradeable if it has charges. Dragonfire shield charges now properly decrease when using the special attack. The special attack for colored vine whips has been fixed. Attack and defence has been modified to be more accurate. Dragon claws and dragon dagger specials are now a bit more accurate. The chance for players to get PvP equipment in the wilderness has been increased based upon risk.
Have fun! - Ryan.[/QUOTE]

item.title: -SlashScape- -Webclient-24/7-Economy-PKing-Community-Bosses-Minigames
item.dc:creator: @Slash2 -Slash-
item.description:
@Slash2 wrote:

Soulcist:

I don’t know what it is with me having problems with servers that need to have to register to get online. Well, I’ve registered on the forums and using the same username and password, and the ‘Create a New Account’ option on the client directs to a page that doesn’t even exist anymore, so what’s up now?

Honestly, I dont see your problem. After you register you just…log on. You use the same username and password as your forum account. They’re linked so what happens on your forum account (like say, a password change or a ban) will happen to your in-game account.

Also, there is no malicious code or anything, the guy was BSing. It’s totally safe.

Read full topic

Well, I’ve registered on the forums and using the same username and password, and the ‘Create a New Account’ option on the client directs to a page that doesn’t even exist anymore, so what’s up now?
[/quote]

Use the register links provided on this page. Registering helps connect your player account to your forum account as well as stop advertisers from spamming the server.[/quote]
Yes, that’s what I’ve done, the username is ‘Soulcist’.

Read full topic

item.title: -SlashScape- -Webclient-24/7-Economy-PKing-Community-Bosses-Minigames
item.dc:creator: @Slash2 -Slash-
item.description:
@Slash2 wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Visit our website at http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php
Register for SlashScape: http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php
Play SlashScape here:http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php


[CENTER]Slashscape is a fast growing RS private server. We have been up for nearly five years, and still going strong. We strive to do all we can to make sure you have the best gameplay experience possible. We have a nice and friendly community with very responsive staff who will not ignore you and will make sure to attend to your needs and problems. Our server is expansive and new features are being implemented in every day. So join today, start your adventure, complete quests and win enormous treasures in a 3D world of magic and monsters.[/CENTER]


-We are mainly a PK server with plenty of minigames, skills, and features.
-We are up dedicated, up 24/7 with no lag.
-New updates coming up every day.
-Stable economy.
-You can toggel fixed, resizable, and fullscreen mode on our client.
-We offer standard and HD graphics.
-667 server with 474 graphics and interface. All NPC’s, emotes, and gfx have been integrated for our client.


-We have an advanced vBulletin forum.
-Are forums are connected to the server so you can:
register on the forums and instantly play in-game.
check your ingame high-scores online.
check your offence history.
create support tickets.
-You can also check the Game Update Log to see what recent updates have been made.
-The forums are an overall fun place to hang out and have in-game discussions or simply share some entertaining stuff.


[CENTER]Slashscape has a nice friendly community with over 2500 active users. We pride ourselves in our fun community where anyone’s voice can be heard. We make sure everyone has a chance to be involved. We also offer community events such as PK events, SOTW, POTW, and more.[/CENTER]


[CENTER]We make sure our players have the best experience possible when playing Slashscape. That is why we hand select a mature staff to help maintain the community. The staff is kind and will not ignore your individual needs. We ask you to be respectful to our staff members and they will respect you back. Our new User Management Page will allow the staff to assist the players by allowing the to manage and create support tickets to communicate directly with our staff.[/CENTER]


We feature plenty of minigames to keep your entertained. Some of those minigames include:
-Fight Caves
-Pest Control
-Fight Pits
-Duel Arena
-Kill Zone
-Godwars Dungeon
-Castle Wars
-Barrows
We also feature many bosses including King Black Dragon and the Kalphite Queen.


We have almost every skill working in Slashscape. That includes:
-All combat skills; Hitpoints, Attack, Strength, Defense, Range, and Magic
-Prayer
-Cooking
-Woodcutting
-Fletching
-Fishing
-Firemaking
-Crafting
-Smithing
-Mining
-Thieving
-Slayer


PKing is an important part of the game and there are plenty of areas to kill. Some include:
-Annakarl
-Varrock
-Edgeville
-Green Dragons
-Kill Zone
We also offer a PK point system with great rewards!

[center]Join today![/center]

Visit our website at http://slash-scape.com/forum/index.php
Register for SlashScape: http://slash-scape.com/forum/register.php
Play SlashScape here:http://slash-scape.com/game/index.php

Pictures (More coming soon):
[SPOILER=“Pictures”]












[/SPOILER]

Recent upates:

[QUOTE]Hello SlashScape!

Today we have a long list of in-game updates:

PVP Equipment:

Pvp equipment now degrades during combat. This is necessary as combat is way too unbalanced so long as Pvp equipment does not degrade, and some players become impossible to kill.

However, unlike other half-assed runescape private servers, each piece of equipment degrades separately - just as it does in RuneScape. So, immediately after being used in combat, pieces of PVP equipment will slightly degrade and will not be tradeable. Each degraded piece will be separated in your bank. After a certain amount of hits on each piece of equipment, they will fully degrade and crumble to dust.

The price of PvP equipment in the credits shop has been updated accordingly.

Barrows Equipment

We have updated the barrows equipment to use the same degrade system as Pvp equipment, however barrows equipment (obviously) degrades much more slowly. Each partially degraded piece of barrows equipment will not be tradeable, and separated in your bank (each piece will degrade separately).

Also, the bonuses from partially-degraded barrows equipment have been fixed.

PK Points & PVP Drops:

The PK points system has been totally updated, and is now totally based upon the amount of risked wealth you’re carrying at the time of your kill. This is not the only factor, however, as there are many other factors to prevent item farming.

PvP equipment has also been removed from the PK shop and will now randomly be dropped after killing another player (other rare items are randomly dropped, as well). The drop rates are based upon how much risked wealth you’re carrying, along with other factors (such as combat difference, the area, etc).

For example… A player with 50m risked items (yes, gold counts too) will get more PK points per kill, and a much higher chance of getting a rare PvP drop. However, items which are safe (for example, from the protect item prayer) do not count in your risked items. Also, players who are not skulled will receive little to no PK points per kill.

Have fun!

  • Mod Ryan.[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]Hello SlashScape!

Colored Whips & Dark Bows:

You can now get colored whips and dark bows from Pest Control! Though they are a bit expensive, their street price will outweigh the effort

If you want to get your hands on these new colored items right away, you can get them immediately using SlashScape Credits!

Vine Whips:

Vine whips have now been added to the game, with a 80 attack requirement and a neat special attack. The non-colored version (red) is rarely dropped by abyssal demons in the Slayer Tower.

The special attack, when activated in combat, will hit your opponent 10 times (1 hit/7 seconds) as long as you stay in combat with that player and have the whip equipped. Each hit will have will have a 25% accuracy boost, but will only hit with 33% of your strength.

Also, the special attack does not stack.

If you want one of these new whips right away, head over to the SlashScape Credits Center! You can get the abyssal vine whips in 5 different colors, and the other 4 colors are ONLY available with SlashScape credits (special colored vine whips are not dropped by abyssal demons).

All of the new items are tradeable.

Glitch Fixes:
The glitch that prevented you from picking up dropped flags in cwars has been fixed.
You can no longer enter your team base in cwars while you have the flag equipped.
Clicking the team base portal in cwars has been fixed.
The glitch that deleted your item when removing your equippment with a full inventory has been fixed.

Have fun!

  • Ryan.[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]Hello.

Here are some updates from today. Special thanks to @James for his help!
The glitch preventing trading of random items has been fixed.
Degradeable items are no longer tradeable.
The degrade rate of PVP and barrows equipment has been lowered so they last longer.
Charges for dragonfire shields are now seperate for each individual shield, are are not tradeable if it has charges.
Dragonfire shield charges now properly decrease when using the special attack.
The special attack for colored vine whips has been fixed.
Attack and defence has been modified to be more accurate.
Dragon claws and dragon dagger specials are now a bit more accurate.
The chance for players to get PvP equipment in the wilderness has been increased based upon risk.

Have fun!

  • Ryan.[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
